mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IN_NO ORDER_NO, IN_DATE ORDER_DATE, STORE_NO STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, IN_EA ORDER_EA, EMP_CODE EMP_CODE FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT ORDER BY IN_DATE ASC
SELECT DISTINCT IN_NO ORDER_NO, IN_DATE ORDER_DATE, STORE_NO STORE_NO, EMP_CODE EMP_CODE FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT ORDER BY IN_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_IN_PRODUCT ( IN_NO, STORE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, IN_EA, EMP_CODE) VALUES ( #{ORDER_NO}, #{STORE_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{ORDER_EA}, #{EMP_CODE})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM STORE_IN_PRODUCT WHERE IN_NO = #{ORDER_NO}) as isChk;
